home.presentation:
Hi! My name is
Juan Cruz Ledesma
and I am a Web Developer.

presentations:
I'm 21 years old and I consider myself as someone who knows how to listen and quickly understand a customer needs.
I enjoy working at web design, so I'm always trying to get a balance between art and aesthetics according to what a client needs.

My past experiences working with blueprints made me realize the importance of having both a good architecture and a good design, and to keep myself constantly learning more about Back-End Development, so I can achieve a clean, flexible, and solid code.
I'm enthusiastic about learning new things, and that's why I'm always in constant learning.
I'm currently pursuing a Software Development degree at the I.T.S Córdoba (Higher Technical Institute of Cordoba), so I can get deeper knowledges about Software.
I qualify myself mostly as an Front-End Developer, but i've also got some NodeJS skills and I'm currently focusing in specializing myself at Full-Stack Development
mySkillsPresentations: I consider myself as a detailed person, I always pay attention to even the most minimal details and try to keep the harmony between colors and shapes.

I also consider myself as an autocritical person and I'm always on the look for ways to make more detailed and good looking designs.
I'm always open to suggestions, critics and tips about my job.

proyects.title: Books CRUD
proyects.description: A project made to keep track of and to organize a personal library.
proyects.createdWith:
Made with:
- As Back-End : NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB.
- And as Front-End : HTML5, CSS3 / Bootstrap 4 and vanilla JavaScript.

proyects.title: CRUD Notebook with Login & Register
proyects.description: A log with personal notes to be used as a reminder.
proyects.createdWith:
Made with:
- As Back-End : NodeJS, Express, MongoDB and 'passport.js' module for authenticating users.
- And as Front-End : Handlebars, Bootstrap 4 and vanilla JavaScript.

proyects.title: Portfolio
proyects.description: Project made to show my web development knowledges.
proyects.createdWith:
Made with:
- As Front-End : HTML5, CSS3 and vanilla JavaScript (ES 6)

proyects.title: MERN Stack CRUD
proyects.description: Project made to keep track of the pending tasks from all your current projects.
proyects.createdWith:
Made with:
- As Back-End : NodeJS, Express, MongoDB.
- And as Front-End : ReactJS with useState, useEffect, useContext and useReducer hooks
